name: aidocindexer-browser-extension
description: Browser extension for AIDocumentIndexer - capture web pages and search your knowledge base

scripts.build:chrome: BROWSER=chrome vite build && npm run package:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: BROWSER=firefox vite build --config vite.config.firefox.ts && npm run package:firefox
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
